content: A new Luca Fruit that can be placed on the Luca Arbor to embellish your planet.
As the Luca Arbor grows, a new slot for Luca Fruits becomes available. Place a Luca Fruit on the branches to embellish your planet.
Farmland holds the Luca vitality that nurtures plant growth. As the Luca Arbor grows, more plots become ready for farming.
Mysterious little creatures called Archiboo have appeared all over the place. Go find out where they are!
A new Luca Fruit that can be placed on the Luca Arbor to embellish your planet.
As the Luca Arbor grows, a new slot for Luca Fruits becomes available. Place a Luca Fruit on the branches to embellish your planet.
Farmland holds the Luca vitality that nurtures plant growth. As the Luca Arbor grows, more plots become ready for farming.
Farmland holds the Luca vitality that nurtures plant growth. As the Luca Arbor grows, more plots become ready for farming.
As the Luca Arbor grows, mountains rise on your planet, welcoming a greater diversity of life.
As the Luca Arbor grows, it deepens its connection with the universe! Friends from the Starsea are drawn to it, forming the brilliant "meteor shower" spectacle.
As the Luca Arbor grows, a new slot for Luca Fruits becomes available. Place a Luca Fruit on the branches to embellish your planet.
Farmland holds the Luca vitality that nurtures plant growth. As the Luca Arbor grows, more plots become ready for farming.
As the Luca Arbor grows, a new slot for Luca Fruits becomes available. Place a Luca Fruit on the branches to embellish your planet.
Farmland holds the Luca vitality that nurtures plant growth. As the Luca Arbor grows, more plots become ready for farming.
As the Luca Arbor grows, your planet expands to reveal a beach region where you can beachcomb and forage for items.
A new Luca Fruit that can be placed on the Luca Arbor to embellish your planet. It decorates the planet's grasslands with patterns of stars.
Farmland holds the Luca vitality that nurtures plant growth. As the Luca Arbor grows, more plots become ready for farming.
Farmland holds the Luca vitality that nurtures plant growth. As the Luca Arbor grows, more plots become ready for farming.
Farmland holds the Luca vitality that nurtures plant growth. As the Luca Arbor grows, more plots become ready for farming.
A new Luca Fruit that can be placed on the Luca Arbor to embellish your planet. It decorates the planet's grasslands with patterns of flower buds and stars.
As the Luca Arbor grows, mysterious "breathing" dirt mounds begin to appear across the planet. Try digging into them to uncover the surprises hidden beneath!
As the Luca Arbor grows, peach trees sprout across the planet! Watch them change with each season and feel the wonders of nature unfold!
As the Luca Arbor grows, the planet offers a gift: cabbage seeds. Plant them in the soil and wait for your first harvest!
As the Luca Arbor grows, flame trees sprout across the planet! Watch them change with each season and scatter "raindrops" like garden sprays in summer.
As the Luca Arbor grows, the planet offers a gift: potato seeds. Plant them in the soil and wait for your first harvest!
